title: Textile, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: combination of 7&1 satin and a twill background (lampas).
inscribed: Block-printed in blue ink on back "444-3-3975" and a five pointed star within a circle on each upper back corner.
dimensions:
Warp: 177.5cm (69 7/8") 
Weft: 133.5cm (52 9/16")
Pattern: Height: 87cm (34 1/4in.). Width: 66cm (26in.). 2 units of pattern in the width of fabric.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Design in orange of flowers, cornucopias and leaves on a bright yellow background.

tombstone.epitaph:

ca. 1900. Medium: silk
